What is Go?

  • Created by Google in 2007—First released in 2012
  • New language
  • Open-source
  • Multi-purpose
  • Multi-platform
  • Compiled
  • Why is it also called Golang?

Designed by: Ken Thompson, Rob Pike, Robert Griesemer @ Google
post.markdown:
# What is Go?

- Created by Google in 2007—First released in 2012
- New language
- Open-source
- Multi-purpose
- Multi-platform
- Compiled
- Why is it also called Golang?

> Designed by: Ken Thompson, Rob Pike, Robert Griesemer @ Google
post.title: What is Go?
